question:
Consider the following schemes/programmes by central government:
  1. SETU
  2. SWAYAM
  3. Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojna
  4. India Aspiration Fund (IAF)
Which of the above aim to fund/support Start-Ups in India?
explanation:
Self-Employment and Talent Utilisation (SETU) mechanism. SETU will be a Techno-Financial, Incubation and Facilitation Programme to support all aspects of start up businesses, and other self-employment activities, particularly in technology-driven areas.
SWAYAM is the Indian electronic e-education platform which proposes to offer courses from the high school stage to Post-Graduate stage in an interactive electronic platform. Pradhan Mantri MUDRA (Micro Units Development and Refinance Agency) Yojana aims to support and earn the contribution of small entrepreneurs in the economy.
